title: A Knight’s Quest
body:
A Knight’s Quest


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Sky9 Games, Curve Digital
Languages: ENG/MULTI5
Original Size: 6.6 GB
Repack Size: 3.9 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on A.Knights.Quest-CODEX ISO release: codex-a.knights.quest.iso (7,087,259,648 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 6.6 to 3.9 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 7 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

A gorgeous action adventure on an epic scale. Play as Rusty – a kind-hearted, but clumsy adventurer who accidentally starts a chain of events which will destroy his world. Solve mind-bending puzzles, fight challenging enemies, defeat huge bosses and platform your way through a fantastic open world in this lavish take on classic action adventure games.

Rusty begins his adventure with just a trusty sword and basic shield, but he’ll soon unlock ‘Spirit Powers’ – spectacular abilities which have the power to transform not only himself, but also the world around him. Harness the powers of Fire, Ice and Time to devastating effect, using them to conquer enemies in battle or solve environmental puzzles.

Game Features

  • Massive action adventure set in a breathtaking open world
  • Meet a huge cast of hilarious characters
  • Pull off epic combos with a simple-to-use combat system
  • Explore the world in style as you wall-run, grind and leap through each vast area
  • Colossal bosses. And we mean colossal.
